definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]

sentences.english: It's easy to love with just words and tongue.
sentences.chinese: 只用訁語和舌頭來愛是輕而易舉的。

sentences.english: All children have natural talent for language learning.
sentences.chinese: 談到學習語訁，小朋友向來有天賦。

sentences.english: You learn to move your mouth in new ways.
sentences.chinese: 當你學習一個新的語訁時。

sentences.english: Indeed. Language is a wonderful tool.
sentences.chinese: 語訁是個非常好用的工具。

definition: plant mentioned in Book of Songs, uncertainly identified as carambola or star fruit (Averrhoa carambola)
da! (sound used to move animals along)
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
